page.description: Public user defined function. PRINT_TO_FAX() selects the appropriate object, merges it with the selected data, and displays the Print dialog box..
page.syntax: OutputString as C = print_to_fax(C obj_type ,C obj_name ,C filter_str ,C order )

argument.name: obj_type
argument.description: Object_Type The name of an object type. The following values are possible:

argument.name: obj_name
argument.description: The name of the object to fax.

argument.name: filter_str
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records.
